description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- October 15th, 2024

description: In 2022, Games Workshop began the annual “Grand Narrative”, where six narrative games would be played out over a three day period.  This was beyond that of a mere Grand Tournament – the idea is that it is is *also* supposed to be an immersive experience and live action LARP while also playing toy soldiers.   […]
title: Contemptor Kevin’s Road to the 2024 Grand Narrative, Part 1 – The Road to Kessandras

description: This article is part of a series designed to help you navigate the Administratum app that Goonhammer provides to help players navigate the rules for Crusade campaigns. In this article we cover how to create a campaign. While Administratum is a helpful tool for tracking your Crusade roster, we’ve built a ton of features around […]
title: Administratum: How to Create A Campaign

description: The First One, En Sabah Nur, The Eternal One, the subject of today’s How to Paint Everything: Marvel: Crisis Protocol goes by many names but is best known as the Supervillain, Apocalypse. Apocalypse has grown into an adversary of mythical proportions, since his first appearance in X-Factor #5, even remaking the Marvel comic universe in […]
title: How to Paint Everything: Marvel Crisis Protocol – Apocalypse

description: It’s less than a week since the last one of these, but there’s even more changes to be seen and we want to talk about the ones that we like the most…and then some others that we don’t really care for very much. If you missed it we’ve already talked about the large Nord and […]
title: Goonhammer Hot Take: Conquest October Update

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? returns covering the newly revealed Kill Team Starter Set! He covers the re-released Angels of Death models, the brand new Death Guard kill team, the new MDF terrain, as well as whether this new starter set will be a good deal for new players! Have any questions or […]
title: CYRAC: Kill Team Starter Set Reveal
